Elderly female with weak legs due to several health issues relies heavily on a wheelchair for mobility — especially for medical appointments and haircuts. Her current wheelchair is faulty and needs replacing.
She is cared for by her two older sisters, who are also ageing and struggling to support her. A wheelchair with high armrests and enclosed sides — similar to those typically used in Singapore hospitals — would be ideal, as it offers better support, comfort, and security for both client and caregiver when pushing.

elderly male living alone — who is in need of a self-propelled wheelchair to support his mobility and independence. 
A self-propelled wheelchair would greatly improve his quality of life by allowing him to move independently without relying heavily on others for daily needs.

description: Client is a single mother to 4  young children. Husband is incarcerated and she is unable to work due to mental health concerns. Mother had suffered a foot fracture a few months ago and continued to experience pain in her foot. She hopes to buy a better cushioned pair of shoes to relieve the pain she's experiencing. Kindly consider offering this request for this client. Thank you.
